content: voices you didn t know what you were looking for till you heard the voices in your ear - cheap trick purl and eyelet row create texture flow and drape this cowl pattern which is knit in the round materials needed 400 yards 100g fingering weight yarn shown using peepaloofields in bikini 3 stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends blocking supplies us 7 4 5 mm 32 circular needle ©orangejellyfish by sarah raasch all rights reserved orangejellyfishdream@gmail com �1 of �5 finished measurements after blocking approximately 19 long 16 wide at the bottom 12 wide at top gauge gauge is not necessary for this pattern notes adjust to a larger needle size if you want a larger looser cowl if you have more than 400 yards of yarn and wish to make the cowl longer you can repeat the pattern again repeat directions marked with an asterisk * helpful links yarn over tutorial youtube video ssk tutorial youtube video long - tail cast - on youtube video glossary k - knit p - purl pm - place marker sm - slip marker k2tog - knit 2 stitches together st s - stitch es yo - yarn over eyelet increases ssk - slip slip knit left leaning decrease ©orangejellyfish by sarah raasch all rights reserved orangejellyfishdream@gmail com �2 of �5 directions section 1 cast on 140 stitches using a long - tail cast - on join in the round and pm to mark the start of a round round 1 - 2 k all round 3 p all round 4 - 5 k all round 6 p all round 7 - 8 k all round 9 p all round 10 - 11 k all round 12 *k2tog yo* to the end of the round marker round 13 - 14 k all round 15 p all round 16 - 17 k all round 18 p all round 19 - 20 k all round 21 p all round 22 k all repeat k rounds for 2 more inches section 2 start decreases *at the second set of decreases the stitch markers may need to be slipped off in order to k2tog and the replaced these are only to be guides in marking decreases placement is not crucial round 1 - 2 k all round 3 p all round 4 - 5 k all round 6 p all round 7 - 8 k all ©orangejellyfish by sarah raasch all rights reserved orangejellyfishdream@gmail com �3 of �5 round 9 p all round 10 - 11 k all round 12 *k2tog yo* to the end of the row marker round 13 - 14 k all round 15 p all round 16 - 17 k all round 18 p all round 19 - 20 k all round 21 p all round 22 k 35 pm k 70 pm k to end repeat k rounds for 1 inch *ssk k to 2 sts before the next marker k2tog sm* repeat two more times 134 sts repeat
